title: Immunogenicity and Safety of AdimFlu-S, Formulation 2010-2011, in Infants Aged Between 6-12months Old

metadata.brief_title: Immunogenicity and Safety of AdimFlu-S, Formulation 2010-2011, in Infants Aged Between 6-12months Old
metadata.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the antibody response to each of the three influenza vaccine strains included in the seasonal flu vaccine(AdimFlu-S), as measured by hemagglutination inhibition (HAI) at 4 weeks after two doses of study vaccine, 4 weeks apart, in infants between 6 and 12 months of age.
